original_text: And as often as the king went into the house of the Lord, the guard came and carried them and brought them back to the guardroom.
korean_text: 왕이 여호와의 전에 들어갈 때마다 경호하는 자가 그 방패를 들고 갔다가 경호실로 도로 가져갔더라

sentences.original_text: And as often as the king went into the house of the Lord
and brought them back to the guardroom
